database

Class QMFood

  • java.lang.Object
    • database.QMFood

  • public class QMFood
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class QMFood. Query Methods for the food classes, ingredients and meals, and subscription plans (NOT connections between subPlan and order)

      View all subscription plans in database
      Returns list of subscription plans in a two-dimensional String array
      First index is row, second is column

      Columns by second index:
      0 : sub_id - int
      1 : sub_name - String

      • viewIngredients

        public static java.lang.String[][] viewIngredients(Database database)
        View list of ingredients. Returns a list of all ingredients in database in a two-dimensional String array First index is row, second is column

        Columns by second index:
        0 : ingredient_id - int
        1 : name - String
        2 : quantity - int
        3 : unit - String
        Parameters:
        database - Database connection
        Returns:
        String[][] of ingredient info

      • viewMeals

        public static java.lang.String[][] viewMeals(Database database)
        View meals. View list of meals. Returns a list of all meals in database in a two-dimensional String array
        First index is row, second is column

        Columns by second index:
        0 : meal_id - int
        1 : meal_name - String
        2 : instructions - String
        3 : available - boolean
        4 : price - int
        Parameters:
        database - Database connection
        Returns:
        String[][] of meal information

        3 : quantity - int (quantity in stock)
